form.name: form1

span.style: caret-color: #000000; font-family: Arial, Arial; font-size: 14px; text-size-adjust: auto;color:#ffffff

div.span: Out of an abundance of caution and a moral and ethical responsibility to our students, staff and community we will close all schools based on PA Department of Health recommendations regarding social distancing and large group gatherings.

span.style: caret-color: #000000; font-family: Arial, Arial; font-size: 14px; text-size-adjust: auto;color:#ffffff

div.span: All schools will be closed effective Monday, March 16, 2020 and will remain closed until further notice.

span.style: caret-color: #000000; font-family: Arial, Arial; font-size: 14px; text-size-adjust: auto;color:#ffffff

div.span: We will be in contact with you to provide updates as needed.

span.div: Please utilize the webpage linked here for the most current information regarding the Coronavirus (COVID-19).

div.style: float:left; width:100%; border-bottom:1px solid gainsboro; margin-bottom:15px;
div.a: A Letter From Your LIU and Local Superintendents

br.span: Please click the Read More link to view the letter addressing our local school community from our LIU 18 administrators, our superintendent, Dr. Costello, and all the superintendents of our Intermediate Unit 18 Region.

div.style: float:left; width:100%; border-bottom:1px solid gainsboro; margin-bottom:15px;

br.span:
OFFICIAL NOTICE is hereby given that the WILKES-BARRE AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT BOARD OF EDUCATION WILL hold a Regular Board Meeting on TUESDAY, APRIL 21, 2020 at 6:00 PM. The meetings will be held virtually and streamed live through the District website. The agenda will be posted on the website on Monday, April 20, 2020 at 5:00 p.m. Public comments/questions shall be submitted via email to [email protected] until 2:00 p.m. Tuesday, April 21, 2020. All comments and questions must include your name and address.
BY ORDER OF THE BOARD
Thomas F. Telesz, Secretary

div.style: float:left; width:100%; border-bottom:1px solid gainsboro; margin-bottom:15px;
float:left; width:100%; border-bottom:1px solid gainsboro; margin-bottom:15px;

br.span: SAT Testing scheduled for tomorrow, March 14, 2020, has been cancelled. More information will be provided as it becomes available.

div.style: float:left; width:100%; border-bottom:1px solid gainsboro; margin-bottom:15px;

br.span:
The Wilkes-Barre Area School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding the non-discrimination policies:
The Wilkes-Barre Area School District Superintendent, 730 South Main Street, Wilkes-Barre, PA 18711-0375, 570-826-7111. Click here to read the Nondiscrimination Policy and Procedure.
